channel.title: Fealtx [2006] Spawn PK || Flawless Old-School Pking
channel.description:
*This was originally posted on Rune-Server under the title of FallenPkz, but that has since been changed, as I have stopped working with Fallen Ashe as he is very immature, which led to his ban on rune-server for forever.
[CENTER][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/fnu3j7.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center][COLOR=blue]Fealtx, the revolution of spawn servers (Not really lol)This will be a 317(2006) Spawn server, with Pkpoints and no customs (Meaning only items from 2006). Featuring flawless pking, this is the server to go to if you want to quench your thirst for oldschool pking, while not having to grind on a poorly coded remake with douchebag staff.[/COLOR] ;)[/center]
[COLOR=green] Features:
*Full clipping *Flawless 2006 pking *Perfect Potions *Perfect shops *Only 317 items, include zerker rings, Fire Cape and Abby whip etc. *Perfect Dharoks *Friendly staff (Forum staff and mods will be needed) *Super Donators get custom yell command *Only Staff and Donators can yell *Pkpoints challenging and rewarding *Pure, Master and setlevel commands
And More!
These are pictures taken by ex-coowner Fallen Ashe. This was before we he was kicked and we changed the name. [/COLOR]
[CENTER][COLOR=RED]Mage (There is ahrims, just didnt wear it)[/COLOR]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603654/Mage.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED]Range[COLOR=RED]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603655/Range.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED]Perfect Dharoks[COLOR=RED]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603663/Dharoks.png[/img]
[COLOR=RED]Full pots + mage and range pots[COLOR=RED]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603665/Pots.png[/img]
[COLOR=BLUE]Other Stuff[/COLOR] This was before we made a yelltag command. [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603672/Commands.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603676/PkShop.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603677/Questtab.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603681/Yell_command_Custom.png[/img] [/CENTER]
Credit: %80 Izumi for Prixus remake base Me: %20 for redoing things to it, adding some combat formulas and leeching his base :)
This is a pretty big leech, but Im learning stuff, and hopefully will be able to convert it to hyperion, and writing hyperion combat, therefore releasing this. Once I get a Vps and finish removing npc's I will host it.
Thank you for reading :)

item.title: Fealtx [2006] Spawn PK || Flawless Old-School Pking
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4

@arham_4 wrote:

I like that you are honest

item.title: Fealtx [2006] Spawn PK || Flawless Old-School Pking
item.dc:creator: @Fealt Fealt
item.description:
@Fealt wrote:

*This was originally posted on Rune-Server under the title of FallenPkz, but that has since been changed, as I have stopped working with Fallen Ashe as he is very immature, which led to his ban on rune-server for forever.

[CENTER]

fnu3j7.png1054×361
[/CENTER]

[center][COLOR=blue]Fealtx, the revolution of spawn servers (Not really lol)This will be a 317(2006) Spawn server, with Pkpoints and no customs (Meaning only items from 2006). Featuring flawless pking, this is the server to go to if you want to quench your thirst for oldschool pking, while not having to grind on a poorly coded remake with douchebag staff.[/COLOR] ;)[/center]

[COLOR=green]
Features:

*Full clipping
*Flawless 2006 pking
*Perfect Potions
*Perfect shops
*Only 317 items, include zerker rings, Fire Cape and Abby whip etc.
*Perfect Dharoks
*Friendly staff (Forum staff and mods will be needed)
*Super Donators get custom yell command
*Only Staff and Donators can yell
*Pkpoints challenging and rewarding
*Pure, Master and setlevel commands

And More!

These are pictures taken by ex-coowner Fallen Ashe. This was before we he was kicked and we changed the name.
[/COLOR]

[CENTER][COLOR=RED]Mage (There is ahrims, just didnt wear it)[/COLOR]

[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603654/Mage.png[/img]

[COLOR=RED]Range[COLOR=RED]

[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603655/Range.png[/img]

[COLOR=RED]Perfect Dharoks[COLOR=RED]

[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2603663/Dharoks.png[/img]

[COLOR=RED]Full pots + mage and range pots[COLOR=RED]

Pots.png775×536

[COLOR=BLUE]Other Stuff[/COLOR]
This was before we made a yelltag command.




[/CENTER]

Credit: %80 Izumi for Prixus remake base
Me: %20 for redoing things to it, adding some combat formulas and leeching his base

This is a pretty big leech, but Im learning stuff, and hopefully will be able to convert it to hyperion, and writing hyperion combat, therefore releasing this. Once I get a Vps and finish removing npc’s I will host it.

Thank you for reading
